comment.author: 박성민
comment.content: Definitely, I'm interested .. Thanks in advance.

post.content:
Hi,
If you're interested in applying government opportunities as a JEE developer, please attach your note here. I will forward the information whenever I hear.
These days, it is the busiest time of a year.
post.title: Massive Gov opportunities are on
